data.name: The True Slime King - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Soundtrack is a work in progress. ​When buying the soundtrack, you get access the current and future versions of the soundtrack in both MP3 (192kbps)​ and WAV format. There are currently 39 tracks totaling a bit over 1 hour 30 minutes of music. Some of the songs in the soundtrack differ slightly from the in-game songs.​ Once the Corrupt Mode DLC is made available, the soundtrack from Corrupt Mode will be included in this Soundtrack DLC.

WARNING: The songs Shadow King contains potential SPOILERS.

Track list:

Echoing Entrance Songs
01) 2:12 - Are We The Last
02) 5:28 - Sunshine Drifting
03) 1:58 - The Bridge From Death
04) 2:50 - Wishing Spell
05) 3:29 - Dangers Of The Dark
06) 2:34 - The Featured Villain
07) 2:26 - Reaching For This Dream

Crystal Caves Songs
08) 2:30 - Real Ethereal
09) 2:18 - This Is Despair
10) 1:29 - Behind The Shadows
11) 2:24 - Focus Focus
12) 2:24 - Chill River
13) 1:56 - The Groove Tube

Mushroom Mantle Songs
14) 1:40 - Chippy Forest
15) 2:17 - Is This Our Fate
16) 1:56 - I Found The Fallen
17) 3:09 - Bass Of The Deep
18) 2:03 - Muddy Maddness
19) 2:51 - Locked On
20) 0:56 - Where No One Will Find Us

Metal Mines Songs
21) 3:00 - Coming For This Day
22) 1:42 - Taste Of Fate
23) 2:26 - Full Combo No Bar
24) 2:37 - Destiny Muffin
25) 2:28 - Now That's My Tempo
26) 1:52 - When We Found The Darkness

Secret Shadowsphere Songs
27) 1:45 - Wise Mother Willow
28) 1:30 - In The Sights
29) 2:10 - Face To Face
30) 4:06 - The Last Breath
31) 1:36 - Archipelago
32) 2:34 - Speed Test

Other Songs
33) 1:40 - The Other Side Of Me
34) 0:55 - What You Are
35) 1:22 - Shadow King
36) 6:12 - The End Is Near
37) 0:46 - 80 Flow
38) 1:44 - We Are Chip
39) 2:53 - Time At Last

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD eqv
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Needed
  • Additional Notes: Your computer must be able to play WAV or MP3 files

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD eqv
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Needed
  • Additional Notes: Your computer must be able to play WAV or MP3 files

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD eqv
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Needed
  • Additional Notes: Your computer must be able to play WAV or MP3 files
